summary: Za'rin is a simple khajiit follower
descriptionHtml: Za'rin is a warrior class khajiit that specializes in archery, one handed, block and light armor. also decent with two handed sneak and heavy armor He can be found at guard barracks in whiterun. He has no special voice acting or story, he is simply a khajiit follower. this is my first mod and feedback would be appreciated
author: Brady Miles
